  • Method Details

    • func

      public double[][] func​(double[] x, boolean identity) throws ConvergenceException, IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Evaluates the Jacobian of f at the given point x[0..n-1].
      Parameters:
      x - - vector specifying the point at which to evaluate the Jacobian
      identity - - if true the returned Jacobian is just the identity matrix
      Returns:
      the Jacobian Matrix of the function at the point x[0..n-1]
      Throws:
      ConvergenceException - only if identity is false
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the given point is outside the bounds of the FieldTable (derivative via exact diagonalization is not supported).

    • func

      public double[][] func​(double[] x) throws ConvergenceException, IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Evaluates the Jacobian of f at the given point x[0..n-1].
      Specified by:
      func in class fij_xi
      Parameters:
      x - - vector specifying the point at which to evaluate the Jacobian
      Returns:
      the Jacobian Matrix of the function at the point x[0..n-1]
      Throws:
      ConvergenceException - if the number of times an exact diagonalization was performed exceeds 20.
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the given point is outside the bounds of the FieldTable (derivative via exact diagonalization is not supported).

    • getField

      private double[] getField​(double[] x, int i, double[][][] int_config_Matrix, double extBx, double extBy, boolean suppressInternalTransFields)
      Calculates the local field at site i
      Parameters:
      x - - vector of the magnetic moments of all of the spins
      i - - the spin at which to calculate the field
      int_config_Matrix - - the interactions table
      extBx - - external Bx
      extBy - - external By
      suppressInternalTransFields - - are internal transverse fields suppressed
      Returns:
      the magnetic field at spin i in the format {Bz,By,Bx}

    • funcNumerical

      public double[][] funcNumerical​(double[] x) throws ConvergenceException
      Evaluates the Jacobian at point x[0..n-1] by finite difference
      Parameters:
      x - - vector that signifies the point for the function f at which to evaluate the Jacobian
      Returns:
      the Jacobian matrix at point x[0...n-1]
      Throws:
      ConvergenceException

    • altFunc

      public double[][] altFunc​(double[] x) throws ConvergenceException
      Numerically calculates a derivative by finite difference - alternative to funcNumerical(double[])
      Parameters:
      x - - The point at which the derivative is to be calculated
      Returns:
      the Jacobian evaluated at point x[0..n-1]
      Throws:
      ConvergenceException

    • derivative

      public double derivative​(double[] x, int denklem_ref, int x_ref) throws ConvergenceException
      Numerically calculates a derivative by finite difference
      Parameters:
      x - - The point at which the derivative is to be calculated
      denklem_ref - - which vector element of the function f should be differentiated
      x_ref - - the variable with respect to which the differentiation should be performed
      Returns:
      Throws:
      ConvergenceException
